conditionThreshold.filter: resource.type = "k8s_container" AND resource.labels.container_name = "api" AND metric.type = "kubernetes.io/container/memory/used_bytes" AND resource.labels.cluster_name = "cluster-1"
resource.type = "k8s_container" AND resource.labels.container_name = "web" AND metric.type = "kubernetes.io/container/memory/used_bytes" AND resource.labels.cluster_name = "cluster-1"

documentation.content: This alert triggers when memory usage for the API container exceeds 800MB or the Web container exceeds 600MB for more than 5 minutes continuously. High memory usage can lead to container termination or degraded application performance. Consider increasing memory limits or investigating memory leaks if this alert triggers frequently.
